name: Lesser Inscription of the Axe
htmlTooltip:
Lesser Inscription of the Axe
Binds when picked up
Requires Level 80
Requires The Sons of Hodir - Honored
Use: Permanently adds 30 attack power and 10 critical strike rating to a shoulder slot item.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 18 75
